channel.title: (NEW) 317 - Forgotten Fear *Updated 12/7*

[url=http://forgottenfear.smffy.com]forgottenfear.smffy.com[/url] [img]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/65325580/border2.png[/img]
-Mod Joe -Mod Josh
This is a newly opened server, looking to improve and satisfy players. -Active staff -Working skills -2006 feel (no godswords, claws, bandos armor, and armadyl armor. 3rd Age is 'best') -Barrows, Fight pits, Assault, Castle Wars minigames -Quick EXP
